definition: to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment
scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate

sentences.english: In this paper the design of a computer-aided tool for tailoring C software (TTCS) is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了计算机辅助C源程序裁剪工具的设计实现。

sentences.english: They could easily get to do the typing.
sentences.chinese: 那样裁剪师就可以很容易地读懂图纸了，是吗？

sentences.english: The image in this article has been cropped and enhanced to improve contrast.
sentences.chinese: 文章中的图像已经被裁剪并且增强以提高对比度。

sentences.english: An algorithm for triangulating multi trimmed surfaces is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的多裁剪曲面三角划分的方法。

sentences.english: Then it is ready to be peeled off, cut and sewn.
sentences.chinese: 然后，将它剥离，裁剪及车缝。

sentences.english: The windowpane lightens the profile and adds a dash of sporting athleticism to the cut.
sentences.chinese: 窗格纹会增亮形体且给裁剪带上一点大方的运动精神。

sentences.english: Costume body model is taken as the alternative of body in solid cutting out.
sentences.chinese: 服装人体模型在立体裁剪中充当人体的替代品。

sentences.english: In Part Two, I will provide examples on process tailoring.
sentences.chinese: 在第二部分中，我将提供过程裁剪的示例。

sentences.english: The only outfit exception: A well-cut suit.
sentences.chinese: 但裁剪得体的套装除外。

sentences.english: Or does it entail sitting down with a pattern cutter and designing?
sentences.chinese: 或者是需要坐下来与裁剪师和设计师讨论吗？

sentences.english: And then carries on frustum culling and collision detection and response based on it.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上进行摄影机裁剪和物体的碰撞检测及响应。

sentences.english: Cropping is an essential Photoshop tool for all digital photographers.
sentences.chinese: 裁剪对于数码照相而言是不可缺少的工具。

sentences.english: The shoemaker carefully examined the leather before starting to cut out the uppers.
sentences.chinese: 鞋匠仔细察看了这张皮子以后才开始裁剪鞋帮儿。

sentences.english: He relied on drapery rather than tailoring to construct his new look.
sentences.chinese: 他开创了女性服装依赖于材质而非裁剪的新气象。

sentences.english: Cropping can be used to increase focus of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 裁剪可以用来增强焦点的感觉。

sentences.english: Clipping is one of basic problems in computer graphics.
sentences.chinese: 裁剪是计算机图形学中的一个基本问题。

definition: paper pattern as model in dressmaking/paper patten
to sew together/suture (in surgery)/to sew up (a wound)
Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
